text: Ra, yadi timile svasniharula'i samagama garnu agadi talaka dinchau, tara mahara niscita garisakeka chaum bhane nirdharita rakamako adha di'ihalnu. Ho, yadi svasniharule maharako rakama mapha gardachin athava jasako hatama vivaha bandhana cha usale chadide'os. Ra yadi timi purusaharu nai aphna adhikara chadidinchaum, bhane yo atmasanyamako kura ho. Parasparika sadabhava ra bhalo garna nabirsanu, nihsandeha allaha timra sampurna kriyakalapa dekhirakheko cha
